A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi had a lot to live up to\, but did fall flat at times. The Force Awakens and Rogue One were tough acts to follow\, but Last Jedi did a decent job. I definitely wanted more\, but this was a good movie with some amazing scenes and characters. And a special shout-out to the \"lightspeed\" scene... that was visually the most breathtaking moment of any Star Wars movie.
